edu.cmu.cs.crystal.internal
Class WorkspaceUtilities

java.lang.Object
  edu.cmu.cs.crystal.internal.WorkspaceUtilities

public class WorkspaceUtilities
extends java.lang.Object

A collection of methods used to extract useful data from the workspace. These methods are used by the framework and should not be used by users of the framework. You can access must of the data collected from these methods via the Crystal class.

Author:
David Dickey

WorkspaceUtilities

public WorkspaceUtilities()
Method Detail

scanForCompilationUnits

public static java.util.List<org.eclipse.jdt.core.ICompilationUnit> scanForCompilationUnits()
Traverses the workspace for CompilationUnits.

Returns:
the list of all CompilationUnits in the workspace

collectCompilationUnits

public static java.util.List<org.eclipse.jdt.core.ICompilationUnit> collectCompilationUnits(org.eclipse.jdt.core.IJavaElement javaElement)
A recursive traversal of the IJavaModel starting from the given element to collect all ICompilationUnits. Each compilation unit corresponds to each java file.

Parameters:
javaElement - a node in the IJavaModel that will be traversed
Returns:
a list of compilation units

parseCompilationUnits

public static java.util.Map<org.eclipse.jdt.core.ICompilationUnit,org.eclipse.jdt.core.dom.ASTNode> parseCompilationUnits(java.util.List<org.eclipse.jdt.core.ICompilationUnit> compilationUnits)
Goes through a list of compilation units and parses them. The act of parsing creates the AST structures from the source code.

Parameters:
compilationUnits - the list of compilation units to parse
Returns:
the mapping from compilation unit to the AST roots of each

scanForMethodDeclarations

public static java.util.List<org.eclipse.jdt.core.dom.MethodDeclaration> scanForMethodDeclarations(java.util.Map<org.eclipse.jdt.core.ICompilationUnit,org.eclipse.jdt.core.dom.ASTNode> compilationUnitToASTNode)
Collects all top level methods from CompilationUnits. (Embedded Methods are currently not collected.)

Parameters:
compilationUnitToASTNode - the mapping of CompilationUnits to preparsed ASTNodes
Returns:
the list of all top level methods within the CompilationUnits

scanForMethodDeclarationsFromAST

public static java.util.List<org.eclipse.jdt.core.dom.MethodDeclaration> scanForMethodDeclarationsFromAST(org.eclipse.jdt.core.dom.ASTNode node)
Collects all top level methods from an AST including embedded methods.

Parameters:
node - the root of an AST
Returns:
all top level methods within the AST

public static java.util.Map<java.lang.String,org.eclipse.jdt.core.dom.ASTNode> scanForBindings(java.util.Map<org.eclipse.jdt.core.ICompilationUnit,org.eclipse.jdt.core.dom.ASTNode> compilationUnitToASTNode)

scanForBindings

public static java.util.Map<java.lang.String,org.eclipse.jdt.core.dom.ASTNode> scanForBindings(org.eclipse.jdt.core.ICompilationUnit compUnit,
                                                                                               org.eclipse.jdt.core.dom.ASTNode node)

findCompilationUnits

public static java.util.List<org.eclipse.jdt.core.ICompilationUnit> findCompilationUnits(java.util.List<java.lang.String> files)
Returns the list of compilation units for a given list of file names. All compilation units that contain one of the given strings are returned.

Parameters:
files - List of file names to search for. They will be compared to the result of getWorkspaceRelativeName(IJavaElement).
Returns:
List of compilation units for a given list of file names.

getWorkspaceRelativeName

public static java.lang.String getWorkspaceRelativeName(org.eclipse.jdt.core.IJavaElement element)
Walks up the Java model hierarchy and separates the names of encountered elements by forward slashes

Parameters:
element -
Returns:
Symbolic name of the given Java element relative to the workspace root

getASTNodeFromCompilationUnit

public static org.eclipse.jdt.core.dom.ASTNode getASTNodeFromCompilationUnit(org.eclipse.jdt.core.ICompilationUnit compUnit)
Gets the root ASTNode for a compilation unit, with bindings on.

Parameters:
compUnit -
Returns:
the root ASTNode for a compilation unit, with bindings on.

getDeclNodeFromType

public static org.eclipse.jdt.core.dom.ITypeBinding getDeclNodeFromType(org.eclipse.jdt.core.IType type)
Given an IType from the model, this method will return the type binding associated with that type.
